Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our services, process, and pricing.

General Questions

We offer comprehensive web design and development services including:

  • Custom website design and development
  • WordPress and headless CMS solutions
  • E-commerce development
  • Website redesigns and modernization
  • Performance optimization
  • SEO and accessibility audits
  • Ongoing maintenance and support

Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope:

  • Simple websites: 2-4 weeks
  • Business websites: 4-8 weeks
  • E-commerce sites: 8-12 weeks
  • Custom applications: 12+ weeks

We'll provide a detailed timeline during the proposal phase.

Our comprehensive packages typically include:

  • Custom design and development
  • Mobile-responsive design
  • Content management system
  • Search engine optimization
  • Performance optimization
  • Security best practices
  • Testing and quality assurance
  • Training and documentation
  • 30 days of post-launch support

Still have questions?

We're here to help! Get in touch for a free consultation.
